page.title: 11RECREATION
page.content: {LEISURE FACILITIES. A survey was conducted in the Aberaman area.It took the form of a questionnaire presented to a cross- section of the community in the following age groups:Under 12,12-15, 15-18,18-25,25-50 and Over 50. Existing facilities include:Youth Clubs,Y.M.C.A.,Beavers,Brownies, Scouts,Church Hall,Aberaman Hall (Gymnastics,Boxing,Karate,Judo, Dancing,Bingo,Reading Room),Snooker Hall,Public Houses and Social Clubs. The survey showed that greatest provision of leisure facilities existed for people under 15 years old. Least provision was for people over 50. Of the people interviewed 50% travelled outside the Aberaman area to enjoy their leisure time.The most popular request for a new leisure facility was an Ice-Skating Rink.
